body_html: Yes, as Soumith said, WITH_DISTRIBUTED_MW, master worker mode is something we are actively working on and don't recommend to use it at this point. distributed should be automatically built by default without any flags.
body_text: Yes, as Soumith said, WITH_DISTRIBUTED_MW, master worker mode is something we are actively working on and don't recommend to use it at this point.  distributed should be automatically built by default without any flags.
body: Yes, as Soumith said, WITH_DISTRIBUTED_MW, master worker mode is something we are actively working on and don't recommend to use it at this point.  distributed should be automatically built by default without any flags.
